Sql.query: insert into trn_doccategoria ( doccatcodi, doccatnombre, doccatusername, doccatfecins ) values ( :doccatcodi, :doccatnombre, :doccatusername, :doccatfecins )
update trn_doccategoria set doccatnombre = :doccatnombre, doccatfecins = :doccatfecins where doccatcodi = :doccatcodi
select * from trn_doccategoria where (doccatnombre like '%' + :doccatnombre + '%' or :doccatnombre is null)
